name: Rocket App Source
subtitle: An awesome source with the best apps.

apps.name: Geode
apps.subtitle: An intuitive mod loader for Geometry Dash.
apps.localizedDescription: Manages installing and launching Geometry Dash with Geode for iOS.

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: A mod you are using is requesting this permission.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: A mod you are using is requesting this permission.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This permission is needed for accessing the JIT server.

apps.name: MCDS (Old)
apps.subtitle: An app for US students at MCDS.

apps.name: AngelAuraAmethyst (Alpha)
apps.subtitle: A new Minecraft Java launcher (JIT)
apps.localizedDescription: A Minecraft: Java Edition Launcher for iOS based on PojavLauncher.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Angel Aura Amethyst uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer and LAN servers.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Angel Aura Amethyst uses the microphone to enable support for voice chat mods.

apps.name: Ksign
apps.subtitle: on-device IPA signing tool for iOS
apps.localizedDescription: Yet another codesigning app, have you ever wondered what if Feather and Esign had a child?

apps.name: Flappy Bird
apps.subtitle: Original Flappy Bird remake
apps.localizedDescription: This is an extremely close clone to the original FlappyBird by Dong Nguyen.

apps.name: OldOS
apps.subtitle: iOS 4 but in an app
apps.localizedDescription: OldOS is a testament to the days of yesteryear, showcasing what iOS once was ten years ago. The ethos of the app is to merge the technologies of today with a pixel-perfect recreation of the user experience of the past.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: To view, play, and experience your music in OldOS, please enable access to your music library.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take photos in OldOS, please enable access to your camera.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: To view and manage your contacts in OldOS, please enable access to your contacts list.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: To record your audio while filming a video in OldOS, please in enable microphone access.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access.

apps.name: PojavLauncher (Discontinued)
apps.subtitle: Minecraft Java Launcher (JIT)
apps.localizedDescription:
From Boardwalk's ashes here comes PojavLauncher!

PojavLauncher is a launcher that allows you to play Minecraft: Java Edition on your Android and iOS devices.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: PojavLauncher uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer and LAN servers.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: PojavLauncher uses the microphone to enable support for voice chat mods.
